name: travel-trunk
effect: Unobtainable, but allows the player to change clothes anywhere.
short_effect: Unobtainable, but allows the player to change clothes anywhere.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A light and yet incredibly effective trunk, which can
contain every last piece of clothing that can
be bought.
